* The BlipException class is a generic exception class
* that is thrown for any invalid actions in the Blip ChatBot.
* The DateTimeFormatException class is an exception class
* that is thrown when a date time with wrong format is input.
* The EmptyDescriptionException class is an exception class
* that is thrown when any component of the commands are missing.
* The EmptyTaskNumberException class is an exception class
* that is thrown when the index of delete/mark/unmark commands are missing.
* The InvalidCommandException class is an exception class
* that is thrown when the command are not valid.
* The WrongTaskNumberException class is an exception class
* that is thrown when the index of delete/mark/unmark commands are not valid.
